meanings.sent1: The torn paper was tapeable and easily fixed.
meanings.sent2: The cardboard box was tapeable, so we sealed it shut with tape.
meanings.sent3: The tapeable present looked like a mummy wrapped in tape.
meanings.sent4: Her words were tapeable, sticking to my mind long after she spoke.
meanings.sent5: The tapeable instructions made it simple to assemble the furniture.

meanings.sent1: The smooth surface was tapeable and perfect for applying tape.
meanings.sent2: The tapeable material adhered well to the adhesive.
meanings.sent3: The tapeable wall was covered in colorful tape art.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was tapeable, bringing joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The tapeable box was ready to be sealed with tape.
